head.title: GVCTC Food Distribution - Garnet Valley School District

meta.content: We understand that not having the availability of the school lunch program during the school closure may present a significant hardship for some of our families. This Monday we will be distributing food to those in need.

nav.div: Garnet Valley School District » News » What's New » GVCTC Food Distribution

img.title: gvctc-garnet-valley-community-that-cares-food-distribution
img.p:
We understand that not having the availability of the school lunch program during the school closure may present a significant hardship for some of our families.
If this is the case for your family, please complete this form - Grab and Go Food Distribution Form
Garnet Valley School District will be providing Grab and Go meals to families in need for their children 18 years of age and under. Meals will be available for pick up:
Mondays and Wednesdays - 11 AM to 12 PM
Garnet Valley Middle School's rear entrance
You will be provided with the following:
Monday, you will receive 2 breakfasts for Tuesday and Wednesday and 3 lunches for Monday, Tuesday, & Wednesday.
Wednesday, you will be provided with 3 breakfasts for Thursday, Friday & Monday and 2 lunches for Thursday & Friday.
You will need to pre-register on the above document by Monday morning at 7AM to receive food for the week.
If you have any questions, please feel free to email Kristin Smeins - smeinsk@garnetvalley.org

a.div:
80 Station Road, Glen Mills, PA 19342
P: 610-579-7300
